guide.introduction: Anyone can podcast, absolutely anyone. Without any prior knowledge, you can quickly learn the simple techniques needed to produce high quality recordings. The most important thing you need to bring to the table is content.
guide.introduction_rendered: Anyone can podcast, absolutely anyone. Without any prior knowledge, you can quickly learn the simple techniques needed to produce high quality recordings. The most important thing you need to bring to the table is content.

lines.text: Before you begin, you need to know why you want to podcast.  You need great content to attract subscribers.  Think about what you have to share and what value you can add.
lines.text_raw: Before you begin, you need to know why you want to podcast.  You need great content to attract subscribers.  Think about what you have to share and what value you can add.

lines.text: If you're convinced that you have a strong concept and podcasting is the right media then you're ready to go.
lines.text_raw: If you're convinced that you have a strong concept and podcasting is the right media then you're ready to go.

lines.text: It's time to record your wisdom. Head on over to http://audacity.sourceforge.net and download their free software.
lines.text_raw: It's time to record your wisdom.  Head on over to [http://audacity.sourceforge.net] and download their free software.

lines.text: Open audacity and press record.  It really is as simple as that.
lines.text_raw: Open audacity and press record.  It really is as simple as that.

lines.text: Playback your recording to check for errors.  If you're not happy then drag your cursor over the offending area, deleted it and re-record.
